TopicTitle: How to send in screenshots for the loading screen

Articles.Content:
So, when I was loading up KSP today, I noticed one of the loading screen pictures was taken by a player!

I have a few that might be considered worthy of the loading screen, so, does anybody know if that's a possibility, and, if so, where to send them to?

Unfortunately you just missed the boat

The player-taken loading screens came from a public contest that Squad held here on the forums prior to the release of 1.8.0.

Here's the contest thread, and here's the winners announcement.
The current version does allow you to add your own loading screen images.  Only to your own game, though.
